sentence.Network_en: He worked in the news division of ABC — he was the anchor of its 15-minute evening newscast.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在美国广播公司的新闻部工作——他是晚间15分钟新闻播报的主持人。

sentence.Network_en: An anchor coordinates a newscast in which several correspondents give reports.
sentence.Network_cn: 新闻节目主播在新闻节目中综合整理若干记者的报导.

新闻播报（newscast）：听早晨的世界新闻、解读分析其内容之课程。首先是倾听新闻，掌握其内容重点，加以发表。

list.abs: last week , newscasters reported on another fire tornado in the brazilian municipality of aracatuba in sao paulo state , provoked by this summer' s unusual aridity .上周，新闻播音员报道了另一起火旋风，它发生在巴西圣保罗州市的阿拉萨图巴，这次不寻常的景象是今年夏季的干旱所致。

they saw the US newscaster Walter Cronkite wiping away his tears ; people gathered around televisions from China to Brazil ; pavements outside TV shops crammed as people watched in awe .他们看到美国新闻评论员沃尔特·克朗凯特拭去泪水，看到从中国到巴西的人们聚在电视机前，看到销售电视机的商店外的人行道上，挤满了怀着敬畏之情观
television programs ; television newscasters ., 电视节目 ; 电视新闻广播员.
since Thursday , all Taiwan TV newscasters began to wear the anti-smoking pin to express the TV stations' backing for the ban on indoor smoking .从星期四起，所有台湾电视新闻播音员开始佩戴反吸烟别针，以表达电视台对室内吸烟禁令的支持。

entry.def: A newscast is a news programme that is broadcast on the radio or on television.
